verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump , who [V: had] not been seen publicly for the past 24 days , attended an official White House event with President Donald Trump Monday afternoon .
First lady Melania Trump , who had not [V: been] seen publicly for the past 24 days , attended an official White House event with President Donald Trump Monday afternoon .

[ARG1: First lady Melania Trump] , [R-ARG1: who] had [ARGM-NEG: not] been [V: seen] [ARGM-MNR: publicly] [ARGM-TMP: for the past 24 days] , attended an official White House event with President Donald Trump Monday afternoon .
[ARG0: First lady Melania Trump , who had not been seen publicly for the past 24 days] , [V: attended] [ARG1: an official White House event with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: Monday afternoon] .
